Hello {!Account.Name},
Your BlueWave account is over 90 days due.
Your outstanding account balance is {!Account.Total_Outstanding_Balance__c}.
Your Community Solar Agreement will be officially terminated when you are removed from the project per your agreement. Till then, your account remains due. When you are removed from the project you will be charged $1250 for each Community Solar Share agreement and your utility bill will increase.
To check the status of your account and make a payment online, please login to your BlueWave portal. You can also access your portal at www.bluewavesolar.com. - All of us here at BlueWave P.S.
